svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - September 2 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
September 2, 2023" date: "2023-09-02"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko .Â Notes from Tim Beiko and
Christine Kim : Devnet 8 to be used for most Dencun testing, devnet 9 will include final spec changes
& hopefully be the last devnet Public testnet upgrade order: HoleÅ¡ky (new, smaller number of node
operators), Goerli (deprecated, has most apps/L2s/stakers) and then Sepolia before mainnet HoleÅ¡ky to
test 3/6 (target/max) blobs with option to reduce to 2/4 for other testnets/mainnet Discussions on
Verkle trie live migration vs combining with state expiry and Address Space Extension/Compression
Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko .Â Notes from Tim Beiko and
Christine Kim :
â€¢ Devnet 8 to be used for most Dencun testing, devnet 9 will include final spec changes & hopefully be
the last devnet
Devnet 8 to be used for most Dencun testing, devnet 9 will include final spec changes & hopefully be
â€¢ Public testnet upgrade order: HoleÅ¡ky (new, smaller number of node operators), Goerli (deprecated,
has most apps/L2s/stakers) and then Sepolia before mainnet
Public testnet upgrade order: HoleÅ¡ky (new, smaller number of node operators), Goerli (deprecated, has
most apps/L2s/stakers) and then Sepolia before mainnet
â€¢ HoleÅ¡ky to test 3/6 (target/max) blobs with option to reduce to 2/4 for other testnets/mainnet
HoleÅ¡ky to test 3/6 (target/max) blobs with option to reduce to 2/4 for other testnets/mainnet
â€¢ Discussions on Verkle trie live migration vs combining with state expiry and Address Space
Extension/Compression
Discussions on Verkle trie live migration vs combining with state expiry and Address Space
â€¢ Intro to blobspace : EIP4844 (proto-danksharding) in Dencun upgrade & full danksharding
Intro to blobspace : EIP4844 (proto-danksharding) in Dencun upgrade & full danksharding
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ðŸš¨ðŸš¨ Lido very close to breaching 33% threshold
ðŸš¨ðŸš¨ðŸš¨ Lido very close to breaching 33% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth supermajority, could possibly
cause a chain split Consensus layer: two clients over 33%, a bug could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
â€¢ Consensus layer: two clients over 33%, a bug could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: two clients over 33%, a bug could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Needed: more geographic diversity for both stakers and nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
Needed: more geographic diversity for both stakers and nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
Layer 1
â€¢ Ethereum Execution Layer Specification (EELS): Python reference implementation (similar to consensus
layer Python spec) Grant available to update Yellow Paper with missing pre-merge fork logic
Ethereum Execution Layer Specification (EELS): Python reference implementation (similar to consensus
layer Python spec)
â€¢ Grant available to update Yellow Paper with missing pre-merge fork logic
â€¢ Erigon Caplin (CL client) roadmap
Erigon Caplin (CL client) roadmap
â€¢ Dapplion: Whisk bootstrapping , tradeoffs of bootstrapping strategies
Dapplion: Whisk bootstrapping , tradeoffs of bootstrapping strategies
â€¢ Otterscan v1.32.0 : adds contract interaction (for Sourcify verified contracts)
Otterscan v1.32.0 : adds contract interaction (for Sourcify verified contracts)
Client releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.11.0 : adds HoleÅ¡ky testnet
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Lodestar v1.11.0 : adds HoleÅ¡ky testnet
â€¢ Execution layer: Nethermind v1.20.2 / v1.20.3 : adds HoleÅ¡ky testnet Reth v0.1.0-alpha.8 : sub 1TB
full node, configurable pruning for each table and improvements for Transaction Pool & RPC
Execution layer:
â€¢ Nethermind v1.20.2 / v1.20.3 : adds HoleÅ¡ky testnet
Nethermind v1.20.2 / v1.20.3 : adds HoleÅ¡ky testnet

Transaction Pool & RPC
Reth v0.1.0-alpha.8 : sub 1TB full node, configurable pruning for each table and improvements for
Research
â€¢ Decouple attestation weight from attestation rewards, proposal to reduce risks from liquid staking
Decouple attestation weight from attestation rewards, proposal to reduce risks from liquid staking
â€¢ Cumulative non-expiring inclusion lists , add-on to inclusion list design
Cumulative non-expiring inclusion lists , add-on to inclusion list design
â€¢ Slashing penalties if max effective balance increased (EIP7251), proposes initial penalty be a
constant or scale sublinearly and correlation penalty be modified to scale quadratically
Slashing penalties if max effective balance increased (EIP7251), proposes initial penalty be a
â€¢ PEPC-DVT : Protocol-Enforced Proposer Commitments without changing consensus
PEPC-DVT : Protocol-Enforced Proposer Commitments without changing consensus
Layer 2
â€¢ Arbitrum Stylus : build apps for Nitro chains in Rust, C & C++, live on testnet
Arbitrum Stylus : build apps for Nitro chains in Rust, C & C++, live on testnet
â€¢ Polygon Chain Development Kit (CDK): launch a rollup or validium
Polygon Chain Development Kit (CDK): launch a rollup or validium

StarkWare Stone prover open sourced
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7505 : NFT author registry ERC7506 : Trusted hint registry

ERC7505 : NFT author registry
â€¢ ERC7506 : Trusted hint registry
ERC7506 : Trusted hint registry
Check out Evanâ€™s new podcast: web3 Builders
Are the permabulls lying to you (for clicks and views) about the chances for ETF approval?
Evan says they are, Will disagrees.
Listen on Apple , Spotify or RSS .Â (Or watch on YouTube )
This is a podcast for people who appreciate nuance more than mindless shilling.
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Foundry: Rivet : developer wallet (browser extension), integrated with Anvil, alpha Huffpoint :
vm.breakpoint in Huff to use with Foundry debugger
Foundry:
â€¢ Rivet : developer wallet (browser extension), integrated with Anvil, alpha
Rivet : developer wallet (browser extension), integrated with Anvil, alpha

Huffpoint : vm.breakpoint in Huff to use with Foundry debugger

nested variables
Unique contract designs : BIG, many to one & one to many proxies, overlapping layouts and deeply
â€¢ Arbitrum Sepolia testnet is live, Arbitrum Goerli will be deprecated later in the year
Arbitrum Sepolia testnet is live, Arbitrum Goerli will be deprecated later in the year
â€¢ Circomscribe : analyze Circom code
Circomscribe : analyze Circom code
â€¢ Trail of Bits adding Vyper support to Slither and Echidna
Trail of Bits adding Vyper support to Slither and Echidna
Security
â€¢ Ajna grief vector disclosed , repay debt & withdraw
Ajna grief vector disclosed , repay debt & withdraw
â€¢ Balancer disclosed vulnerability exploited for $2.1 million
Balancer disclosed vulnerability exploited for $2.1 million
â€¢ SharedStake (Liquid staking) 105 ETH exploit , infinite mint via invalid ownership checks
SharedStake (Liquid staking) 105 ETH exploit , infinite mint via invalid ownership checks
Enterprise
â€¢ Swift tokenization experiments used Sepolia testnet via Chainlink CCIP
Swift tokenization experiments used Sepolia testnet via Chainlink CCIP
â€¢ OnlyFans has ETH on its balance sheet
OnlyFans has ETH on its balance sheet
Onchain stats
â€¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9 to 122 gwei, with average around 21. Negative issuance currently
at 20.1 gwei About 400 ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9 to 122 gwei, with average around 21.
â€¢ Negative issuance currently at 20.1 gwei
Negative issuance currently at 20.1 gwei
â€¢ About 400 ETH net burn this week
About 400 ETH net burn this week
â€¢ ETHUSD: $1610-1735, currently ~$1630
ETHUSD: $1610-1735, currently ~$1630
â€¢ ETHBTC : .062-.0635, currently .063 (Flippening at ~.16)
ETHBTC : .062-.0635, currently .063 (Flippening at ~.16)

â€¢ Gitcoin Grants 18 closed , $680k donated from 47k donors

beta

Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ Grayscale procedural victory over SEC in Bitcoin ETF case : SEC must provide a coherent response for
rejection

â€¢ US SEC charges Impact Theory for selling NFTs as unregistered securities Unanimous Republican
dissent from Commissioners Peirce & Uyeda
